content: अर्ध {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [ऋध्-णिच् अच्; according to <ls>Nir.</ls> from धृ, or ऋध्] Half, forming a half (divided into 2 parts); अर्ध-अर्ध the one half-the other half. --र्धः [ऋध्-घञ्] {@--1@} A place, region, country; house, habitation (<ab>Ved.</ab>). {@--2@} Increase (वृद्धि). {@--3@} Wind. {@--4@} A part, portion, side. --र्धं, --र्धः {@--1@} A half, half portion; सर्वनाशे समुत्पन्ने अर्धं त्यजति पंडितः; गतमर्धं दिवसस्य <ls>V. 2</ls>; पूर्वार्धः first half; so उत्तर° latter half; दक्षिण° southern half (half on the right side); so जघन°, अवर°, पर°, ग्राम° &c.; यदर्धे विच्छिन्नं <ls>Ś. 1. 9</ls> divided in half; ऋज्वायतार्धं <ls>M. 27</ls>; <ls>R. 3. 59</ls>, <ls n="R.">12. 99</ls>; रात्रौ तदर्धं गतं <ls>Bh. 3. 107</ls>; one part of two, apart, partly (<ab>Ved.</ab>); {@--2@} Nearness, proximity; see अर्धदेव. अर्ध may be compounded with almost every noun and adjective; as first member of compound with nouns it means ‘a half of’, and forms an एकदोशिसमास or तत्पुरुष; °कायः = अर्धं कायस्य; °पिप्पली, °मार्गः; °पुरुषः &c.; with adjectives, it has an adverbial force; °श्याम half dark; °भुक्त half eaten; so °पिष्ट, °पूर्ण &c.; with numeral adjectives it may mean either ‘a half of’ or ‘with an additional half’; °शतं half of 100 {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} 50; or अर्धेन सहितं शतं {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} 150; with ordinal numerals ‘with a half of that number;’ °तृतीयं containing two and the third only half; {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} two and a half; so °चतुर्थ three and a half.
